tool_description: Contains artificial intelligence news from 3 tech publications for you to grab and read when you need them.
name: Artificial-Intelligence-News
title: Artificial-Intelligence-News

api_list.name: Get Individual AI News Articles
api_list.description: Getting news articles from each of the publications
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://artificial-intelligence-news.p.rapidapi.com/ainews/thenextweb"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "artificial-intelligence-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://artificial-intelligence-news.p.rapidapi.com/ainews/{publicationid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "artificial-intelligence-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get All AI News
api_list.description: This endpoint will return all news about artificial intelligence from all stated publications
